column5: Thinking about booking a trip to fish Lac Seul and was wondering if anyone has stayed or has any info about Golden Fawn Resort near Ear Falls. Any info would be appreciated. Thanks
Hi. It was just my wife and I so we always asked for the honeymoon suite. Its the little cabin off by itself. we found it quite nice, good boats and motors.

The fishing will be great, same area as several other lodges, Evergreen, Timberlane, Gold Pine and others. I stayed at Golden Fawn in 2004, everything was fine, not great but adiquate. the cabin (I can only speak for the one we stayed in) was ok it needed a little TLC, the boats were ok. From what I understand the lodge is up for sale, seems the owner has been stricken w/ a brain tumor or brain cancer, something serious like that
Does anyone know how Ted is getting along?
That's real sad. We were there about 6 weeks prior to Barb losing her first husband to stomach cancer.
The way I understand it, i'ts the Woman(Barb?) that has been struck w/ this ilness. I might be wrong, but I dont think they were married
